snippet.title: The Cleaner Trailer
snippet.description: The Cleaner is a game about extreme video game censorship. Playing as a lead designer, Lia, you need to decide how to produce creatively and publish your game under extreme censorship policies. You will receive critical feedback from your colleagues during the creation process, and you must decide how and if you can integrate this feedback.
